test-case.name: fn-year-from-date1args-1
test-case.description: Evaluates The "year-from-date" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg = xs:date(lower bound)

test-case.name: fn-year-from-date1args-2
test-case.description: Evaluates The "year-from-date" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg = xs:date(mid range)

test-case.name: fn-year-from-date1args-3
test-case.description: Evaluates The "year-from-date" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg = xs:date(upper bound)

test-case.name: fn-year-from-date-1
test-case.description: Evaluates The "year-from-date" function As per example 1 of the F&O specs

test-case.name: fn-year-from-date-2
test-case.description: Evaluates The "year-from-date" function As per example 2 of the F&O specs

test-case.name: fn-year-from-date-3
test-case.description: Evaluates The "year-from-date" function involving a "numeric-less-than" operation (lt operator)

test-case.name: fn-year-from-date-4
test-case.description: Evaluates The "year-from-date" function involving a "numeric-less-than" operation (le operator)

test-case.name: fn-year-from-date-5
test-case.description: Evaluates The "year-from-date" function using the empty sequence as an argument. Use count function to avoid empty file.

test-case.name: fn-year-from-date-6
test-case.description: Evaluates The "year-from-date" function that returns 1.

test-case.name: fn-year-from-date-7
test-case.description: Evaluates The "year-from-date" function that returns a negative number

modified.change: Added error code as alternative. see bug issue #29546

test-case.name: fn-year-from-date-8
test-case.description: Evaluates The "year-from-date" function as part of a "+" expression.

test-case.name: fn-year-from-date-9
test-case.description: Evaluates The "year-from-date" function as part of a "-" expression.

test-case.name: fn-year-from-date-10
test-case.description: Evaluates The "year-from-date" function as part of a "*" expression.

test-case.name: fn-year-from-date-11
test-case.description: Evaluates The "year-from-date" function as part of a "div" expression.

test-case.name: fn-year-from-date-12
test-case.description: Evaluates The "year-from-date" function as part of a "idiv" expression.

test-case.name: fn-year-from-date-13
test-case.description: Evaluates The "year-from-date" function as part of a "mod" expression.

test-case.name: fn-year-from-date-14
test-case.description: Evaluates The "year-from-date" function as part of a "numeric-unary-plus" expression.

test-case.name: fn-year-from-date-15
test-case.description: Evaluates The "year-from-date" function as part of a "numeric-unary-minus" expression.

test-case.name: fn-year-from-date-16
test-case.description: Evaluates The "year-from-date" function as part of a "numeric-equal" expression (eq operator)

test-case.name: fn-year-from-date-17
test-case.description: Evaluates The "year-from-date" function as part of a "numeric-equal" expression (ne operator)

test-case.name: fn-year-from-date-18
test-case.description: Evaluates The "year-from-date" function as part of a "numeric-equal" expression (le operator)

test-case.name: fn-year-from-date-19
test-case.description: Evaluates The "year-from-date" function as part of a "numeric-equal" expression (ge operator)

test-case.name: K-YearFromDateFunc-1
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `year-from-date()`.

test-case.name: K-YearFromDateFunc-2
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `year-from-date((), "Wrong param")`.

test-case.name: K-YearFromDateFunc-3
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `empty(year-from-date(()))`.

test-case.name: K-YearFromDateFunc-4
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `year-from-date(()) instance of xs:integer?`.

test-case.name: K-YearFromDateFunc-5
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `year-from-date(xs:date("2000-02-03")) eq 2000`.
